Asked how come he chose Israel as his first investment outside America, Buffett's response was: "Some Americans came looking for oil, so they didn't stop in Israel.We came looking for brains, so we did stop in Israel." $4.1 billion !

CRAIG BART: former Intel CEO ( visiting Israel ) • “Apart from the 6,000 jobs that we have provided here, in my opinion the contribution to Israel lies in the fact that Intel has attracted other companies to invest in Israel and to create an entrepreneurial environment. Globally speaking, Israel is in 3rd place in terms of IP and is a very good place for opening businesses. The level of education in Israel has helped us expand. Israel’s ability to supply very good scientists has helped us, and the government’s positive attitude has helped us attract investments.”
